definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: The ball will bound back when it is thrown on the pole.
sentences.chinese: 球拋在柱上會彈回來的。

sentences.english: But by the end the year, the weight usually returns.
sentences.chinese: 但是到了年底的時候，體重往往會彈回來。

sentences.english: Work is a rubber ball. If you drop it, it will bounce back.
sentences.chinese: 工作是一個橡膠球，你把它丟在地上，它還會彈回來。

sentences.english: The ball rebounded from the wall.
Thus, when you hit a punching bag, it bounces right back at you.
sentences.chinese: 因此，當你擊吊袋時，它就朝着你彈回來。

sentences.english: The ball rebounded from the backboard.
In the same way, when light falls on certain things it bounces back.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，光照到某些物體上時也會彈回來。

sentences.english: The stone ricocheted off the wall and hit passer-by .
sentences.chinese: 石頭擊中那面牆彈回打著了過路的人。

sentences.english: Loosen the pull rope can be automatically rebound baffle.
sentences.chinese: 鬆開拉繩擋板就可自動彈回。

sentences.english: The ball cannoned off a defender.
sentences.chinese: 球從一名防守隊員身上彈回。

sentences.english: The ball rebounded from the goalpost and Owen headed it in.
sentences.chinese: 球從門柱彈回，歐文頭球將球攻進。

sentences.english: The charge, exploded, and the knife, in springing back, closed into its owners wrist.
sentences.chinese: 槍響了，那把刀彈回去，正切着槍主的手腕。

sentences.english: The guard rebounded off the backboard.
sentences.chinese: 後衛搶到籃板彈回的球。

sentences.english: When I think about the bamboo tree's ability to bounce back or return to its original position.
sentences.chinese: 每當我想到竹子這種彈回去或者說恢復原狀的本領時。

sentences.english: The charge,exploded, and the knife, in springing back, closed into its owners wrist.
sentences.chinese: 槍響了，那把刀彈回去，正切着槍主的手腕。

sentences.english: The ball ricocheted on to the post and back into Walker's hands.
sentences.chinese: 皮球中柱彈回獲加手中。
